sentences.sentence: They were at the mercy of informers who might at any moment denounce them.
sentences.translation: 他们完全受那些随时可能告发他们的告密者的支配。

sentences.sentence: German leaders all took the opportunity to denounce the attacks and plead for tolerance.
sentences.translation: 德国领导人们都藉此机会谴责这些攻击，并且恳请宽容。

sentences.sentence: No wonder it has become fashionable to denounce many universities as little more than elaborate con tricks.
sentences.translation: 难怪谴责许多大学只不过是精心设计的骗局已经成为一种潮流。
